text: William Alex "Bill" Hudson (July 9, 1935 â€“ December 13, 2017) was an American football player. He played as a defensive tackle. He played professionally in the American Football League for the San Diego Chargers and the Boston Patriots. He also played in the Canadian Football League for the Montreal Alouettes. He was a member of the South Carolina Sports Hall of Fame. He was born in Hartsville, South Carolina. Hudson died on December 13, 2017 in Spartanburg, South Carolina.
